reviewText: The DVD is well-done, but it seemed to me that most of the information given was how to warp your loom. Anyone who is attempting pile weaves, should already know how to warp and set up their loom properly, so this part really confused me. I skipped through over half of the DVD because it wasn't relevant to what I needed to learn. The parts that I DID need to learn were very well stated and thought out, easy to understand.
